thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Sabrina

author: Sabrina
title: Sabrina
text:
This is the second time I use Flighthub to book my plane tickets and I have been very satisfied with their prices! I have had no significant issue with one little exception.
I once bought tickets that were leaving at 8:00 (what I thought was 8am since in french 8pm would have been 20:00). When I realised my mistake (within 2 minutes, when I received my confirmation e-mail stating 8pm), I tried to contact them to cancell the reservation or book another flight instead and only then was I informed of a 50$ USD charge for changing a reservation. I was a little disapointed, but it hasen't kept me from booking with them again.
